question: Are we allowed to make dua in any language in sajda after the tasbih in our salaah?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Dua in Arabic is permissible. It is Mukruh Tahrimi to make dua in any other language in Salah. If it is done, the salah will have to be repeated. (Shaami, Ahsanul Fataawa Vol. 3 Pg. 432)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
